text: Ahmed Omar Bani is a Libyan Air Force colonel who defected to the military of the rebel National Transitional Council. He is the current spokesman for the Libyan Ministry of Defence, taking over the position from Khaled al- Sayeh.Libyan fighters: rebels without an officerRebels rely on hope in the absence of firepower ==References== Category:Living people Category:Libyan colonels Category:People of the Libyan Civil War (2011) Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Ahmed Omar Bani
